titleStmt.title: The Lord Digby his last speech against the Earle of Strafford occasioned upon the reading the bill of attainder touching the point of treason.
Last speech against the Earle of Strafford
titleStmt.author: Bristol, George Digby, Earl of, 1612-1677.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
